mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( PK_USER_SEQ, PK_AUTH_SEQ, USER_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, ADDRESS, DETAILED_ADDRESS, EMAIL, REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( ifnull(#{pkUserSeq}, null), #{pkAuthSeq}, #{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{birthday}, #{address}, #{detailedAddress}, #{email}, SYSDATE() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE USE_YN = IF(USE_YN != 'D' ,'Y', 'D')
mapper.update: UPDATE USER set USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE USE_YN != 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) AS cnt FROM USER WHERE USER_ID=#{userId} AND USE_YN != 'D'
